page.title: 07EDUCATION-KIRKMICHAEL
page.content: There are 3 schools in Kirkmichael. First of all the primary school, situated at the most southerly point of the village,which was built in 1970.It can cater for 70 children between the ages of 5 and 12 years. At present there are 43 pupils and 2 full time teachers. The school day lasts from 9a.m.till 3.30p.m. A building which was the original primary school, built in 1870,is used today for mentally and physically handicapped children from 5 to 16 years of age. These children come from a wide area around Kirkmichael and are looked after by a staff of 3.The third school in the village is for maladjusted boys from all over the region. This is called Kirkmichael House School. It is very picturesque with a loch in front and wooded areas on 3 sides. It has 14 boys and a staff of 8.
